descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i1172.photobucket.com/albums/r569/davidjohn1234/721cb30f.png[/IMG][/center]
[b][center][size=2]Injure Kit[/b][/center][/size]
[b][u][center]Abram Creation[/b][/u][/center]

[center][youtube]1FT1KTp3rhw[/youtube]
[b][size=2]Thanks to LivestyleGaming[/b][/size][/center]

[center][url=http://SkyrimGEMS.com][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge_animated.gif[/img][/url]
[size=4][b](Category: 400 - Realism)[/b][/size][/center]

[b] Description
 
requested by Ronsan123, well i decided to share a bit XD

 Do you want to look injured or poor? now this is a mod for you.
 
This Mod Adds a:

- Play\'able Bandages/cuffs

 List of items:

- BA1 Gag
- BA1 Arm Bandage
- BA1 Head Bandage
- BA1 Tunic
- BA1 Trousers 
- BA1 Shoe\'wraps
- BA1 Cuff
(BA1=Vanilla Items)

- BB1 Gag
- BB1 Arm Bandage
- BB1 Head Bandage
- BB1 Tunic
- BB1 Trousers 
- BB1 Shoe\'wraps
- BB1 Cuff
(BB1= Color Black)

- BLo1 Gag
- BLo1 Shoewrap
- BLo1 Tunic
- BLo1 Trousers 
- BLo1 Arm Bandage
- BLo1 Head Bandage
(Blo1= With Blood)

- Bwhi1 Trousers
- Bwhi1 Tunic
- Bwhi1 Cuffs
- Bwhi1 Shoewrap
(Bwhi1= White Color

[u] All Bandages and cuffs have enchantment that is fortify heal rate [/u]

Needed Items:

- Leather
- Leather Strips

 Can Be craft on tanning rack 

 It changes wounded soldiers items to be lootable :)
[/b]

[b]
Required Higher Version of skyrim

not Compatible on changing bandages etc[/b]

[b]
~I might update this and my other mods but im too busy studying (waasome XD)
If anyone want to re\'texture it . go ahead :) 
[/b]

[IMG]http://i1172.photobucket.com/albums/r569/davidjohn1234/ee9c644d.jpg[/IMG]

[b] Big thanks to kaemon [/b]

[b][i] Abram[/b][/i]
